Section.Label: Chapter_ramp_automatic_generated_documentation_Section_ramp_automatic_generated_documentation_of_methods
Section.Heading: ramp automatic generated documentation of methods

ManSection.Description: Returns the universal polytope of rank n.

Returns the flat regular polyhedron with automorphism group [p, q] / (r2 r1 r0 r1 = (r0 r1)^i (r1 r2)^j). This function does not currently validate the inputs to make sure that the output makes sense.
Returns the quotient of M by rels, which may be given as either a list of Tietze words, such as [[1,2,1,0,1,2,1,0]] or as a string like "(r0 r1 r2 r1)^2, (r0 r1 r2)^4".
Returns the universal extension of M, i.e. the maniplex with facets isomorphic to M that covers all other maniplexes with facets isomorphic to M. Currently only defined for reflexible maniplexes.
Returns the universal extension of M with last entry of Schlafli symbol k. Currently only defined for reflexible maniplexes.
Returns the trivial extension of M, also known as {M/, 2}.
Returns the flat extension of M with last entry of Schlafli symbol k. (As defined in "Flat Extensions of Abstract Polytopes".) Currently only defined for reflexible maniplexes.
Returns the amalgamation of M1 and M2. Implicitly assumes that M1 and M2 are compatible. Currently only defined for reflexible maniplexes.
Given a 3-maniplex M, returns its medial.
